Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Physics of Baseball & Performance Enhancing Drugs
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: SPACE SHUTTLE: FINAL COUNTDOWN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: July 21, 2011 marked not only the end of the space shuttle program, but the end of an era. Over the last 30 years, the shuttles Atlantis, Columbia, Challenger, Discovery and Endeavour have had many triumps and tragedies, as told by the astronauts, NASA scientists, and designers who helped this ambitious program take flight.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High in the mountains and far removed from the light pollution of big cities, the Atacama Desert in Chile provides some of the best views on Earth of the night sky. Advanced telescopes gather images that rival, and sometimes surpass the Hubble Space Telescope

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Vancouver Island's Western Coastline is a collection of scenic towns, parks and coastal rainforest unique in the world - from Tofino, to Pacific Rim National Park Reserve, and Clayoquot Sound UNESCO Biosphere Reserve.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Canada's easternmost point to Europe's westernmost point, this aerial survey explores the Atlantic coastline, from the wonders of St. John's Newfoundland and the Avalon peninsula - to the unique islands of St. Pierre and Miquelon.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation, we can see outside the scope of our vision.

Clip.Title: CRUISE SHIP DOWN: SAVING CONCORDIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: On January 13, 2012, the largest passenger shipwreck in history occurred when the Costa Concordia struck a submerged rock off Italy's Tuscan coast. Once a floating pleasure palace for more than 4,200 passengers and crew, the half-sunken ship spent the next two years as a grisly tourist attraction...and an ecological time bomb. Relive the night of her crash, captured on video by those aboard the liner. Then witness the monumental engineering challenge that followed as 500 experts from 24 nations teamed up to pry this 114,000-ton ship from her rocky grave.

Clip.Title: TITANIC'S FINAL MYSTERY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: One century after the sinking of the Titanic, a 20-year investigation reveals the unusual set of circumstances that ultimately led to the ship's tragic demise. Travel back 100 years and witness what really happened in the final hours before and after the Titanic collision.

Clip.Title: TITANIC: THE BAND PLAYED ON
Clip.EpisodeSummary: When the RMS Titanic set sail across the Atlantic from Southampton on her maiden voyage 100 years ago, she made history. Most potent of all was that of the band standing on deck, bravely playing on until the last lifeboat had left and there was no hope of escape.

Clip.Title: U455 - THE MYSTERY OF THE LOST SUBMARINE
Clip.Episode: U455 - The Mystery of the Lost Submarine
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In summer 2008, a mysterious submarine was discovered off the coast of Italy at 120 meters deep. For Lorenzo del Veneziano, an underwater marine archeologist, it was an amazing sight, as the submarine was intact! Could this be the wreck of the long lost U-455, the last missing German U-boat from World War II?

Clip.Title: TITANIC'S FINAL MYSTERY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: One century after the sinking of the Titanic, a 20-year investigation reveals the unusual set of circumstances that ultimately led to the ship's tragic demise. Travel back 100 years and witness what really happened in the final hours before and after the Titanic collision.
